level.heading: Legislative history of Law 20-224
level.text: Law 20-224, the “Behavioral Health System of Care Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-676. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 18, 2014, and Dec. 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 23, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-539 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-224 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.

level.heading: Editor’s notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-224: Section 4 of D.C. Law 20-223 provided that the act shall apply upon the date of inclusion of its fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan; that the Chief Financial Officer shall certify the date of the inclusion of the fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan, and provide notice to the Budget Director of the Council of the certification; and that the Budget Director shall cause the notice of the certification to be published in the District of Columbia Register and that the date of publication of the notice of the certification shall not affect the applicability of the act.
